organism_name.title: organism_name
organism_name.description: Name of the expected organism. Should corrospond to a NCBI Taxonomy node

taxonomy_id.title: taxonomy_id
taxonomy_id.description: NCBI taxonomy identifier of the organism.

isolate.title: isolate
isolate.description: identification or description of the specific individual from which this sample was obtained

collected_by.title: collected_by
collected_by.description: Name of persons or institute who collected the sample

collection_date.title: collection_date
collection_date.description: the date on which the sample was collected; date/time ranges are supported by providing two dates from among the supported value formats, delimited by a forward-slash character; collection times are supported by adding "T", then the hour and minute after the date, and must be in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC),

geo_loc_name.title: geo_loc_name
geo_loc_name.description: Geographical origin of the sample; use the appropriate name from this list http://www.insdc.org/documents/country-qualifier-vocabulary.¬†

isolation_source.title: isolation_source
isolation_source.description: Describes the physical, environmental and/or local geographical source of the biological sample from which the sample was derived.

lat_lon.title: lat_lon
lat_lon.description: The geographical coordinates of the location where the sample was collected.

culture_collection.title: culture_collection
culture_collection.description: Name of source institute and unique culture identifier. See the description for the proper format and list of allowed institutes, http://www.insdc.org/controlled-vocabulary-culturecollection-qualifier

host.title: host
host.description: The natural host to the organism from which the sample was obtained.

host_age.title: host_age
host_age.description: Age of host at the time of sampling

host_description.title: host_description
host_description.description: Additional information not included in other defined vocabulary fields

host_disease.title: host_disease
host_disease.description: Name of relevant disease, e.g. Salmonella gastroenteritis. Controlled vocabulary, http://bioportal.bioontology.org/ontologies/1009 or http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/mesh

host_disease_outcome.title: host_disease_outcome
host_disease_outcome.description: Final outcome of disease, e.g., death, chronic disease, recovery

host_disease_stage.title: host_disease_stage
host_disease_stage.description: Stage of disease at the time of sampling

host_health_state.title: host_health_state
host_health_state.description: Information regarding health state of the individual sampled at the time of sampling

host_sex.title: host_sex
host_sex.description: Gender or physical sex of the host

type_material.title: type_material
type_material.description: Material used for species identification method.
